meanings.definition: Relating to or involving a conference.
meanings.sent1: The conferential meeting brought together experts from different fields.
meanings.sent2: The team had a conferential discussion to plan the upcoming event.
meanings.sent3: The conferential gathering turned into a lively debate about the agenda.
meanings.sent4: Her conferential skills in coordinating schedules were invaluable to the team.
meanings.sent5: The conferential atmosphere buzzed with excitement and collaboration.

meanings.definition: Of or pertaining to a conference.
meanings.sent1: The conferential materials included the schedule and list of speakers.
meanings.sent2: Attendees received a conferential packet with all the necessary information.
meanings.sent3: The conferential badges were color-coded for easy identification.
meanings.sent4: His conferential expertise ensured a smooth flow of the event.
meanings.sent5: The conferential room was set up with rows of chairs and a podium.

meanings.sent1: The conferential call allowed all team members to participate.
meanings.sent2: The conferential software enabled seamless communication among colleagues.
meanings.sent3: Their conferential approach to problem-solving led to innovative solutions.
meanings.sent4: The conferential system streamlined the decision-making process.
meanings.sent5: The conferential nature of the project required frequent updates and coordination.
